ai-tha-ap102:0.3_0: milk-riceiving in the past, the senior monks are doing good;
ai-tha-ap102:2.1_0: See the fruit of your deeds,
ai-tha-ap102:2.2_0: the glorious protector of the world,
ai-tha-ap102:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap102:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap102:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Rohitassa.
ai-tha-ap102:7.1_0: The ten senior monks who were attended on the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap102:7.2_0: The tenth sub-chapter on heaven is finished.
ai-tha-ap102:9.6_0: they’re in this pit by the wind.
ai-tha-ap102:11.1_0: The first sub-chapter on the Buddha is finished,
ai-tha-ap102:12.4_0: And five with wisdom is that of wisdom.
ai-tha-ap102:14.1_0: The group of seven hundred on “without making a hundred” is finished.
